result.translation: No ku bamalayika basoma urwibutso n’amajambo yanje mu guhishurira Intumwa[1]!
result.footnotes: [1] Imana Allah Irahira ku co Ishatse mu biremwa vyayo, nayo ibiremwa ntibirekuriwe kurahira, kiretse kw’izina ryayo gusa. Ukurahira kw’izina ry’ikitari Imana Allah, ni ibangikanyamana.
